summary: Ancient Beast is a turn-based strategy game that aims to introduce users to open-source game development and blockchain technology. The project is designed to be easy to learn, fun to play, and challenging to master. It offers features like online multiplayer, AI practice bots, and crypto duels. The project seeks funding to overcome current bottlenecks, such as implementing animations and enhancing multiplayer capabilities.
review: The Ancient Beast project presents a compelling case for funding within the GG23 OSS - dApps and Apps round. It aligns well with the round's goals by contributing to the growth of the open-source ecosystem and enhancing Web3 accessibility. The project is innovative in its approach to integrating blockchain technology with gaming, offering unique features like crypto duels and NFT marketplaces. However, the application lacks detailed information on how the grant funds will be specifically allocated to achieve the stated goals. Additionally, while the project has a clear vision, it needs to provide more concrete evidence of its current impact and user base to justify the scalability and broad impact claims. The project should also address the technical feasibility of its proposed features, such as blockchain integration and AI development, to strengthen its application.

strengths.title: Innovative Integration of Blockchain and Gaming
strengths.description: The project uniquely combines blockchain technology with a turn-based strategy game, offering features like crypto duels and NFT marketplaces, which are not commonly found in similar projects.

strengths.title: Contribution to Open Source Ecosystem
strengths.description: Ancient Beast actively introduces users to open-source game development and blockchain technology, fostering growth and education in these areas.

strengths.title: Clear Vision and Goals
strengths.description: The project has a well-defined vision for future development, including specific features and enhancements that align with the goals of the funding round.

weaknesses.title: Lack of Detailed Funding Allocation
weaknesses.description: The application does not provide a detailed breakdown of how the grant funds will be used to achieve the project's goals, which is crucial for assessing the feasibility and impact of the proposed developments.

weaknesses.title: Insufficient Evidence of Current Impact
weaknesses.description: The application lacks concrete data or metrics demonstrating the project's current user base and impact, making it difficult to assess its scalability and potential for broad impact.

weaknesses.title: Technical Feasibility Concerns
weaknesses.description: There is a need for more detailed information on the technical feasibility of the proposed features, such as blockchain integration and AI development, to ensure they can be successfully implemented.

changes.title: Provide Detailed Funding Allocation
changes.description: Include a comprehensive breakdown of how the grant funds will be allocated to specific project goals and developments.

changes.title: Demonstrate Current Impact and User Base
changes.description: Provide data or metrics that showcase the project's current user base and impact to support claims of scalability and broad impact.

changes.title: Address Technical Feasibility
changes.description: Offer detailed explanations of the technical feasibility of proposed features, such as blockchain integration and AI development, to strengthen the application's credibility.
